languages.text: "У тебя был выбор — остаться преданн{mf|ым|ой} Императору или примкнуть к ереси. Ты его сделал{mf||а}".
"You had a choice, to remain loyal to the Emperor or to join the ranks of heretics. You made it."
languages.original_text: "У тебя был выбор — остаться преданн{mf|ым|ой} Императору или примкнуть к ереси. Ты его сделал{mf||а}".

traits.locale_text: "You had a choice, to stay loyal to the Emperor or to join the ranks of heretics. You made your choice."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "You had a choice, to stay loyal to the Emperor or to join the ranks of heretics. You made your choice."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "You had a choice, to stay loyal to the Emperor or to join the ranks of heretics. You made your choice."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "You had a choice, to stay loyal to the Emperor or to join the ranks of heretics. You made your choice."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "You had a choice, to remain loyal to the Emperor or to join the ranks of heretics. You made it."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "You had a choice, to remain loyal to the Emperor or to join the ranks of heretics. You made it."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “你是有选择的。你可以选择忠于帝皇，也可以选择加入异端分子的行列，而你已经做出了选择。”
languages.original_text: "You had a choice, to remain loyal to the Emperor or to join the ranks of heretics. You made it."

traits.locale_text: “你是有选择的。你可以选择忠于帝皇，也可以选择加入异端分子的行列，而你做出了选择。”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「お前には皇帝に忠誠を誓うか、異端の仲間入りをするという選択肢があったはずだ。これはお前が選んだ道なのだ」
languages.original_text: "You had a choice, to remain loyal to the Emperor or to join the ranks of heretics. You made it."

traits.locale_text: 「お前には皇帝に忠誠を誓うか、異端の仲間入りをするという選択肢があったはずだ。これはお前が選んだ道なのだ」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «Tenía la opción de mantenerse fiel al Emperador o unirse a las filas de herejes. Tomó su decisión».
languages.original_text: "You had a choice, to remain loyal to the Emperor or to join the ranks of heretics. You made it."

traits.locale_text: «Tenía la opción de mantenerse fiel al Emperador o unirse a las filas de herejes. Tomó su decisión».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Ihr hattet eine Wahl, nämlich dem Imperator treu ergeben zu bleiben oder Euch den Reihen der Ketzer anzuschließen. Ihr habt Eure Wahl getroffen."
languages.original_text: "You had a choice, to remain loyal to the Emperor or to join the ranks of heretics. You made it."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr hattet eine Wahl, nämlich dem Imperator treu ergeben zu bleiben oder Euch den Reihen der Ketzer anzuschließen. Ihr habt Eure Wahl getroffen."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Deux voies s'offraient à vous : rester fidèle à l'Empereur ou rejoindre les rangs des hérétiques. Vous avez fait ce choix vous-même. »
languages.original_text: "You had a choice, to remain loyal to the Emperor or to join the ranks of heretics. You made it."

traits.locale_text: « Deux voies s'offraient à vous : rester fidèle à l'Empereur ou rejoindre les rangs des hérétiques. Vous avez fait ce choix vous-même. »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Seçim şansın vardı: Ya İmparator'a sadık kalacaktın ya da kâfirlerin arasına katılacaktın. Seçimini yaptın."
languages.original_text: "You had a choice, to remain loyal to the Emperor or to join the ranks of heretics. You made it."

traits.locale_text: "Bir seçeneğin vardı: İmparator'a sadık kalmak ya da kâfirlerin arasına katılmak. Seçimini yaptın."
traits.speaker: Chorda
